description: Quick and easy no bake protein energy balls are filled with all of the best wholesome ingredients. Easy to customize and the perfect go to treat.
name: No Bake Protein Energy Balls
recipeIngredient: 2 cups rolled oats (, gluten free if needed)
1 cup pecans (, any nut works or leave out for nut free)

recipeInstructions.text: Place oats, pumpkin seeds, hemp seeds, cacao nibs, and pecans in a large bowl. Place goji berries in a small bowl and fill with warm water. Allow to soak for 5 minutes or until they soften a bit. Once slightly soft, drain water and place berries into the bowl with the rest of the ingredients.
Place dates, vanilla extract, salt and water in a food processor. Mix until partially smooth and partially chunky. This is similar to my date paste recipe but not as smooth and has a tad less water.
Put into the bowl with the rest of the ingredients. Using your hands, mix everything together well until you get a dough like consistency.
You can either press into a parchment lined baking pan to make bars or roll into 1 inch balls. Roll the balls in shredded coconut until covered if desired.
